channel.title: Ml on Systology
channel.description: Recent content in Ml on Systology

item.title: AI/ML Workshop
item.description: Practical, reproducible ML examples (PyTorch/Hugging Face/NumPy) with MPS-aware benchmarks and experiment hygiene for local hardware.

item.title: ETL Pipeline for ML Features
item.description: Robust ETL pipeline for deterministic, reproducible ML feature generation from diverse sources, with idempotence and scale in mind.

item.title: ML Experiments
item.description: Practical guidance for reproducible, resource-aware ML experiments with lightweight MLOps and deterministic evaluation.

item.title: Privacy-Preserving Federated Learning Platform
item.description: Platform design for federated learning that trains across devices without sharing raw data, with secure aggregation and privacy safeguards.

item.title: Ragchain
item.description: Local RAG stack (Chroma + Ollama) for private, reproducible retrieval and LLM usage; focuses on hybrid retrieval, index versioning, and evaluation.

item.title: Scalable Model Serving Inference
item.description: Infrastructure for real-time ML inference with model versioning, autoscaling, and resource-aware fallbacks.
